title: Outstanding Artist Loft with Huge Window & FREE Laundry
description:
Available Early June:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #102 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #102 is a fantastic 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment, offering high ceilings, huge windows, central a/c, and a bright atmosphere. Enter the unit into the common living area offering gorgeous hardwood floors and tons of natural light. Your kitchen is in the center of the apartment and boasts two-tone cabinetry for ample storage space, dark granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, refrigerator, electric range, oven, and built-in microwave. Continue to your two bedrooms which are side by side and sizable with windows. The full bathroom features tile flooring, a vanity, medicine cabinet, and a subway tiled tub with showerhead. FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!

The second-floor features two spacious bedrooms and a full bathroom with a stand up shower. title: four bedroom and three bathroom home that is move-in ready
description:
Welcome to 913 S. 20th; a charming four bedroom, three bathroom home that is move-in ready. The first floor is home to an oversized living room, adjoining a classic dining room with a refinished exposed brick fireplace. Kitchen has hardwood cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances that make this kitchen a dream to work in. Interior access to the basement (with included washer and dryer), recessed lighting, a powder room, and blonde oak floors throughout, which continue into the second floor hallway. Upstairs you'll find three bedrooms and a newly redone bathroom, complete with timeless subway tile and a ceiling mounted rain shower head. All three of the bedrooms have ample closet space. The front and back bedrooms have two and three windows respectively, providing an abundance of light. Following the staircase up to the third floor you'll find the loft like master suite, filled with light, generous closet space, and a newly refinished bathroom. The house also features a beautifully redone backyard that is perfect for entertaining during those great summer nights. Other upgrades include a newer Goodman central A/C (2019), HE Samsung front load washer and dryer (2020), Nest Smart Thermostat, and LED lighting throughout. Schedule your showing today before this one is gone!

title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: Elegant Stone Home at Top of Hill With Garden and Parking
description:
Please consider living in our sun-filled and convenient home! We are moving locally but uncertain if we will return to our classic Chestnut Hill twin, so are looking for tenants. We have spent several years fixing this gem up, with a brand new kitchen, new patio, new windows and a new heating and air conditioning system, along with other tasteful improvements.
The first floor open-plan living and dining room boasts tall ceilings and copious amounts of daylight. Our extremely functional and efficient kitchen is an equally pleasing space, also with plenty of natural light, and there is a tastefully designed pantry/laundry room off the back of the kitchen. A powder room completes the first floor living space, while there is a large storage area before walking out to the back garden.
There are three bedrooms on the second floor, including a master bedroom with plenty of storage and a fireplace. Two moderate sized bedrooms are perfect for home offices or kids bedrooms. A full bathroom is located on this floor.
The fourth bedroom is on the third floor and has commanding views and tons of daylight. There is an adjacent 3/4 bath, and down the hall is a walk-in closet (that we use as a small office space).
Outdoors, there is a full street-side porch that faces southwest, and a small porch on the side of the house that faces southeast and overlooks a very large flagstone patio. New plantings abound and fencing frame the outdoor space which is perfect for entertaining or for kids play.
Other details:
- Basement is partially finished and offers plenty of storage.
- New heating and air conditioning units are among the most efficient available, so heating and cooling bills are very manageable.
- Offstreet parking for two cars.
- Alarm/Fire system available for hookup.
- Utilities to be paid by tenant.
Our home is best described as a sunny and light-filled, with a deep and wide (for its location) garden and patio area. Because of our location we also get unusually long views so you do not feel hemmed in by neighbors. We are a block from the Chestnut Hill West Station and a block from Germantown Avenue, so it is hard to get more convenient if you, like us, enjoy not getting in the car to do everything.
We are looking for tenants who appreciate living in an old home and will take care of it. We prefer no pets but would consider on a case-by-case basis a cat or small dog. We seek a one year lease.
Our move-out date is a bit uncertain so we are exploring the level of interest. We anticipate being out by June 30 or possibly into July. We will update the listing with current photos in the coming days, but the included teaser photos are from when we purchased the home some years ago (decor and setup is very different now).
If you are interested, please tell us a little bit about yourself so that we can understand if this might be a good fit.

title: Prime Location! Lovely Studio with ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED IN THE RENT
description:
Available early June:
Welcome to 1324 Locust St #1418! This incredible studio / 1 bathroom unit is one of the nicest in the Arts Condominiums. Enter into the studio to view gorgeous hardwood floors, a full wall of large windows allowing tons of natural light, and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort. A Murphy bed provides space and convenience, and the dark wood matches your L-shaped kitchen. Kitchen features include dark granite countertops, tile backsplash, breakfast bar, microwave, modern shaker style cabinets, and a full-size stainless steel refrigerator. The full bathroom boasts tile flooring, white subway tiling along the walls and surrounded the shower / tub combo, and a vanity with additional storage options. The Arts Condominium building has an ideal Center City location, walkable to City Hall, Washington Square West, Midtown and Rittenhouse Square areas. The building features a 24/7 front desk attendant, fitness center, business/club room, laundry facilities, on-site management/maintenance and computer terminals with free wi-fi in the lobby. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED IN THE RENT! Some furniture is also included with lease: Murphy bed, couch, coffee table, bar stools, two bookshelves (all except Murphy bed can be removed at tenant’s request). Schedule your tour today!

Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #111 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. title: On site washer and dryer, Elevator building, New fitness center
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
The Severgn Apartments community is centrally located in Exton, PA, just minutes from the PA turnpike, public transportation, shopping, township parks and walking trails. Enjoy a spacious, quality built home nestled within expertly landscaped and well maintained grounds.
The community features 1 and 2-bedroom apartment homes. Pricing and availability are subject to change daily. All of the apartments at Severgn have private entrances, a full size washer and dryer in each unit, central air, ceramic tile bathrooms and a balcony/patio.

Residents pay for their electric, gas heat, water & sewer.
Severgn is a pet friendly community. We allow cats and dogs, maximum of two (breed restrictions apply)

title: Short Term Rental in The Arts Condominiums
description:
LOCATION LOCATION! Looking to rent in The Arts Condominiums? Now is your chance to own a spacious, recently renovated 1BD/1BA condo in this amazing building! Upon entering, you will immediately notice the gorgeous hardwood flooring throughout the entire unit! The completely renovated modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances, modern gray cabinets, timeless backsplash, and granite countertops! The recessed lighting and the maximum closet space are offered both in the kitchen and hallway area. The unit has a modern open floor plan, leading right into the spacious living space with a great size window and built-in wall shelving! There is also plenty of room for a decent size dining area or breakfast nook! The bedroom is completely private and spacious, also equipped with 2 windows offering plenty of natural light! The bathroom features a modern vanity and tub/stall shower combo. The condo fee includes ALL UTILITIES, cable + HBO, 24hr security, community room and gym use, and so much more! Perfectly located right in the heart of the city, opportunities are endless! Only a few blocks away from neighborhoods like Rittenhouse Square, Center City, Washington Square West, and Old City! Anything from museums, attractions, and theaters, to great restaurant scenes and city parks; you will never run out of things to explore! Explore Dilworth Park only a few blocks away, offering seasonal markets throughout the year. Also nearby universities include The University of the Arts, West Chester University in Philadelphia, Eastern University - Center City, Drexel University, and The University of Philadelphia! Also in close proximity to the Broad Street Line, Market-Frankford Line and many bus stops. If downtown, city living with endless amenities is calling your name; come see this condo today! Don't miss out on your opportunity; schedule your showing!
This is a three month lease term and available immediately. First month and security ($3,500) due at lease signing. Utilities included in rent. Pets are conditional on owner’s approval and require an additional monthly pet fee, if accepted. 1 pet maximum per unit. Building pet registration and policy: $120 nonrefundable pet registration fee, and $10 freight elevator fee, which must be used for pet transportation. 40lb weight limit for pets. Breed restrictions– please speak to a listing agent to discuss pet policy details. All utilities are included in rent, tenants responsible for in-unit cable/internet. Please note: free cable will terminate when performance internet is installed throughout the building - estimated for April. The fee to use the Bike Storage Room is $50.00 and tenants are provided with a key to the room. There are bike racks in the room and it is totally up to the tenant whether they wish to secure their bike with a lock. The room, itself, is locked and only available to other residents with keys to the room. Residents using the Bike Room need to know that bikes can only be transported through our side entrance and then their bike must be carried through the lobby, down the steps and into the Bike Room. It is permissible to keep your bike in your condominium, as an alternative, in which case the resident will purchase a key to the freight elevator for $10.00.
